mapRandomSpawn() - Method in class gremlins.Map
Random respawn of enemies gets wizards location via x and y adds 10 spaces in each direction for x and y gets in array to store new coordinates iterate through 2d array and count number of free spaces "0" and add to count 1 randomise number pick between 0 and count iterate through 2d array for spaces == "0' if count equals the count and x and y are above or below distance of wizard
